sentences.en: As one of the most important basic photogrammetry theories, the collinear equation has been applied wildly.
sentences.cn: 在摄影测量学理论中, 共线条件方程是最重要的基础理论之一,具有十分广泛的应用.

sentences.en: Figure 4 - 47 is a diagram of four - point collinear probe setup for resistivity measurements.
sentences.cn: 图4-47是四点同线探针用于电阻率测量的配置图.

sentences.en: It's unavoidable that collinear and non collinear interactions in the process of optical parametric generator.
sentences.cn: 光学参量产生过程中,必然存在共线和非共线光波相互作用.

sentences.en: Most measurement methods are under the non - collinear geometry and have many limitations in applications.
sentences.cn: 绝大多数测量方法都是在非共线几何结构下测量的,在实际应用中有很大的局限性.

sentences.en: The antiplane shear problems of collinear cracks at the interface of dissimilar anisotropic materials aredealt with.
sentences.cn: 本文研究两种各向异性材料界面共线裂纹的反平面剪切问题.

sentences.en: The coaxial collinear printed dipole structure used to improve gain and arrays with good coherence.
sentences.cn: 采用新型同轴直排印刷振子天线结构,易于提高增益和组阵,具有良好的一致性.

sentences.en: The collinear crack problem for a strip of functionally graded materials in antiplane elasticity was studied.
sentences.cn: 讨论了反平面弹性功能梯度材料板条中的共线裂纹问题.

sentences.en: The electroelastic interaction between a piezoelectric screw dislocation and collinear interfacial rigid lines is studied.
sentences.cn: 研究了压电材料中压电螺型位错和共线界面导电刚性线夹杂的电弹干涉效应.

words.tran_cn: [数]共线的；同线的；在同一直线上的

trans.tran_en: lying on the same straight line
